channel.title: Interviews on Looking for Wisdom
channel.description: Recent content in Interviews on Looking for Wisdom

item.title: Andy West on Philosophy, Prison, Freedom and Shame
item.description: A Looking for Wisdom exclusive interview with philosopher Andy West, about prison, shame, freedom and philosophy.

item.title: Sophie Grace Chappell on Plato and the Moral Imagination
item.description: An interview with Sophie Grace Chappell about philosophy, following your deepest impulses, and why mountain climbing is not unlike philosophy.

item.title: Alexus McLeod on Maya Philosophy
item.description: Questions of time, ritual and identity lie at the heart of Maya philosophical traditions. Find out more in our fascinating interview with Alexus McLeod.

item.title: Anna Ezekiel on Günderrode, Identity and Doing Philosophy Differently
item.description: Philosopher Anna Ezekiel talks about Karoline von Günderrode, and about the German philosopher’s distinctive philosophy of free will, identity and death.
